title: Gourmet New South Wales Riverina Escape with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Wine
description:
Treat yourselves to a gourmet escape in New South Wales' stunning Riverina region with a stylish stay at Quest Griffith - a modern retreat surrounded by world-class wineries and artisan produce in the heart of Australia's Food Bowl.

The charming town of Griffith is the perfect place to relax, reconnect and discover some of Australia's best produce at your own pace. Take the short stroll to Banna Avenue and browse the galleries and boutiques, hop between cellar doors on a tour of some of the region's best-known wineries including De Bortoli or allow your tastebuds to discover in the region's Italian heritage with a cannoli or two at Bertoldo's Pasticceria, a fourth-generation family baker. Come evening, relax in your comfortable Studio accommodation, drenched in natural light and featuring a plush king bed and kitchenette - the perfect self-catering abode for weekends away or longer stays.
